directions.content: Listen to the model speaker. Next, Record the sentence (wait for the beep before speaking). Finally, Play your voice and compare it to the model speaker (Listen). Click the forward arrow as needed to see other sentences. Click Submit to send your recordings to your teacher.

question.content: Would you like to visit Japan, Mexico, or the United States?
Would you like coffee, tea, hot chocolate, or water?
Do you take a bath in the morning or at night?
Would you rather have a cat, a dog, or a bird?
Do you want to go to a party or stay home?
